mapper.insert: insert into g_business (BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CODE, ADDRESS, SEND_RANGE, FANS_COUNT, SCORE, BUSINESS_LEVEL, BUSINESS_TYPE, TERMINAL_CODE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY ) values (#{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fansCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessLevel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update g_business set BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_CODE = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_RANGE = #{sendRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FANS_COUNT = #{fansCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_LEVEL = #{businessLevel,jdbcType=BIT}, BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_CODE = #{terminalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CODE, ADDRESS, SEND_RANGE, FANS_COUNT, SCORE, BUSINESS_LEVEL, BUSINESS_TYPE, TERMINAL_CODE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY from g_business where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CODE, ADDRESS, SEND_RANGE, FANS_COUNT, SCORE, BUSINESS_LEVEL, BUSINESS_TYPE, TERMINAL_CODE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY from g_business
